overview: With 15 years of business management, marketing, and consulting experience, Max has helped companies identify opportunities and drive revenue and profit growth. Max worked at WhitePages for more than eight years, most recently serving as President of the Company. Prior to joining WhitePages, he held executive positions at Telesensory Corp. and GiftCertificates.com, and worked as a consultant with Bain & Company and a systems analyst at Procter & Gamble. He holds an MBA with honors from the University of Chicago, and magna cum laude bachelor’s degrees in management information systems and accounting from the University of Cincinnati.
